{{also|vàter|vatër|Väter}} ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Vatter}} {{q|obsolete, except informally, representing the regional pronunciation}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|vater}}, from {{inh|de|goh|fater}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*fadēr}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*ph₂tḗr}}.
